example.eg: She kept her knowledge of the love affair a secret from her husband.
example.egtrans: 她知道这桩风流韵事 , 但没有告诉她丈夫。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 知道, 悉知, 了解

example.eg: The psychologist had a deep knowledge of human nature.
example.egtrans: 这位心理医生对人性有很深的了解。

example.eg: This book has a lot of knowledge in it.  You should study it thoroughly.
example.egtrans: 这本书知识量很大。你应该好好研读。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 知识, 学问, 信息

example.eg: He has a lot of knowledge about the subject, but little practical experience.
example.egtrans: 他在这方面理论知识丰富，但实际经验几乎没有。

example.eg: Nobody had better knowledge of the area roads than he did.
example.egtrans: 没有人比他更熟悉本地路况。

example.eg: We have much more knowledge about sleep disorders today than ever before.
example.egtrans: 我们今天对睡眠障碍的认识比以往任何时候都多得多。

example.eg: The geologist made a discovery that significantly contributed to the body of human knowledge.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 已有知识, 知识体系

example.eg: It used to be considered a sin to have carnal knowledge of anyone before marriage.
The certain knowledge that their children were safe was a relief to the parents.
To my certain knowledge, Wellington won the battle of Waterloo.

dsense.name: in the certain knowledge, in the certain knowledge that

example.eg: Joe waited his turn to go on stage in the certain knowledge he was about to make a fool of himself.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 确定, 确实了解, 确定知道

example.eg: It was common knowledge among the staff that Bill had a drinking problem.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 常识, 尽人皆知的事

dsense.name: encyclopedic knowledge of [sth] (US), encyclopaedic knowledge of [sth] (UK)

example.eg: The children were impressed by their grandfather's encyclopedic knowledge of aircraft.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 广博的知识, 渊博的知识

example.eg: This course enables students to gain knowledge about digital photography.
The team won the pub quiz thanks to the breadth of its general knowledge.
example.egtrans: 这支队伍因了解各方面知识而在酒吧智力竞赛中获胜。

example.eg: Taxi drivers have to have a good knowledge of all the local streets.
I have a thorough knowledge of the subject.
I have knowledge of many programming languages, gained through a lifetime of working in Information Technology.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 熟悉, 了解, 有...方面的知识

example.eg: Some women appear to have an intuitive knowledge of how to care for a newborn child.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 知识导向的，知识主导的

example.eg: I have some practical knowledge of physics but couldn't begin to explain quantum theory.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 实用知识, 实践性知识

example.eg: He had a profound knowledge of astronomy.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 渊博的知识, 深厚的知识

example.eg: I'm afraid I don't have the technical knowledge to fix your laptop.
Jim had a genuine thirst for knowledge.

dsense.name: to the best of my knowledge, to the best of [sb]'s knowledge

example.eg: To the best of my knowledge, all of the coffee shops in the city close before 9:00 p.m.
To your knowledge, did the defendant have anything to drink after 7 o'clock?
